name: Meltdown Imminent
description:
My first ever game jam entry! It has no sound. It barely has any artwork. BUT ITS PLAYABLE! I'm extremely excited to have something done! gonna continue to tinker with the project afterwards; I think it could be more fun with some extra shine added.

Give it a shot and let me know what you think?

If you stop Charging the Recovery systems, you die!

Also be sure to check out  Penusbmic. I used one of his character assets for a placeholder and really love it!

https://penusbmic.itch.io/sci-fi-character-pack-6
